content: the start of the instep sts and includes all sts that were the round put on hold while the heel was worked keep all instep sts grouped together on 1 needle knit across the instep heel flap of the sock then m1 between the instep and the next side you will now be working only on the first half of the sts of the heel flap pick up and knit 11 12 13 14 sts along arrange the first 28 32 36 40 sts so they are all on one selvedge edge of heel flap knit to the beginning of the needle the other sts will not be used until the gusset round you now have 70 78 86 94 sts on your needles section the next rounds instruct you to work in pattern across the row 1 rs sl1 purlwise wyib k across turn work instep of the sock if you are not using self-striping yarn row 2 ws sl1 purlwise wyif p across turn work this means knitting the instep sts for the next 3 rounds and purling them for the following 3 rounds after that you will repeat row 1 and 2 for 10 11 12 13 more times until continue the 7 round pattern of knit between the markers heel flap is 22 24 26 28 row for 4 rounds and purl between the markers for 3 rounds all sts worked on the side and bottom of the foot will be turn heel knit you will now be working short row across the heel flap if using self-striping yarn how instep sts are worked is stitches to create the bottom of the heel determined by how the stripes appear the first row of the next color will be knit and the rest of the instep sts in that row 1 rs sl1 purlwise wyib k16 18 20 22 sts ssk color will be purled k1 turn work round 1 knit to 3 sts before instep k2tog k1 work in row 2 ws sl1 purlwise wyif p7 p2tog p1 turn work pattern across instep k1 ssk k to end of round 2 sts row 3 rs sl1 purlwise wyib k to 1 st before gap ssk decreased k1 turn work copyright lisa k ross 2016 paperdaisy1@gmail com paperdaisy1 on ravelry 2 http //www ravelry com/designers/lisa-k-ross round 2 k to instep work in pattern across instep k to end of round repeat rounds 1 and 2 for 7 more times you should now have 56 64 72 80 sts on your needles foot continue without decreasing working in pattern between the instep markers until the foot measures approximately 1 6 1 75 2 2 25 / 4 4 5 5 5 5 cm less than the total desired length note total length should be approximately 1/2 less than the foot that will wear it toe you will no longer be working in pattern across the instep but will be working all sts in stockinette round 1 k to
